input.description: This username overrides the value specified in the config.
This password overrides the value specified in the config.
Specifies the message Title (also refered as message Text).
Specifies the DnsName (Node Name) of the message.
Specifies the description of the message.
Severity of the message. Possible values could be as follows :- - Normal - Warning - Minor - Major - Critical - Unknown
Specifies the solution attribute of the message.
Specifies the category (Message Group) of the message.
Specifies the SubCategory of the message.
Specifies the ProductType attribute of the message.
Specifies the ProblemType attribute of the message.
Specifies the CollaborationMode attribute of the message. Possible values could be as follows :- - fyi (default) - peer - incident_exchange
Specifies the correlation key of the message.

Specifies the create time of the message.
Note : Create Time should follow the following Format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS
Specifies the key of the custom attribute.
Specifies the text of the custom attribute.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:if test="string-length('${username}') != 0"> <username> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${username}</xsl:text> </username> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${password}') != 0"> <password> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${password}</xsl:text> </password> </xsl:if> <arguments> <title> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${title}</xsl:text> </title> <dns-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${dns name}</xsl:text> </dns-name> <xsl:if test="string-length('${description}')!=0"> <description> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${description}</xsl:text> </description> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${severity}')!=0"> <severity> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${severity}</xsl:text> </severity> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${solution}')!=0"> <solution> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${solution}</xsl:text> </solution> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${category}')!=0"> <category> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${category}</xsl:text> </category> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${sub category}')!=0"> <sub-category> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${sub category}</xsl:text> </sub-category> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${product type}')!=0"> <product-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${product type}</xsl:text> </product-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${problem type}')!=0"> <problem-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${problem type}</xsl:text> </problem-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${collaboration mode}')!=0"> <collaboration-mode> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${collaboration mode}</xsl:text> </collaboration-mode> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${application}')!=0"> <application> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${application}</xsl:text> </application> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${object}')!=0"> <object> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${object}</xsl:text> </object> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${correlation key}')!=0"> <correlation-key> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${correlation key}</xsl:text> </correlation-key> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${create time}')!=0"> <create-time> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${create time}</xsl:text> </create-time> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${custom attribute key}')!=0"> <custom-attributes> <custom-attribute> <key> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${custom attribute key}</xsl:text> </key> <xsl:if test="string-length('${custom attribute text}')!=0"> <text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${custom attribute text}</xsl:text> </text> </xsl:if> </custom-attribute> </custom-attributes> </xsl:if> </arguments> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Utility to create items xml for Create Message process.
